data.text:
Such an amazing experience here in Marco polo Hotel 
The tooms are reallly nice with such an amazing view 
Thanks yo the whole Staff
Pillows  are really soft
I would suggest yo choose marco polo for your amazing stay 
It will added up fabtasy to your trip
data.title: Was such an awesome experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for your kind feedback.

We are glad to know you enjoyed your experience, it encourages us to continue to uphold our high standards.

Our team is always happy to help and it is rewarding to know that you appreciated our efforts to make your stay with us as pleasant as possible.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience.

Best regard,
The Marco Polo Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Marco Polo Hotel

data.text:
The room was so clear and neat, the environment was so friendly 
Specifically the swimming pool and the lifeguard boy Anil was so nice and always accompanying me.
I stayed at 422b room.
I just recommend this hotel to visit and you will not gonna regret
data.title: Recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your positive feedback.

We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your kind comments about our team who work hard to ensure that we deliver the best service and always meet your expectations. Our guests' satisfaction is our highest reward.

We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Best regards,
The Marco Polo Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Marco Polo Hotel

data.text: The room is nice well cleaned and also it was nice experience here and the staf is very professional thank you for him Zara mya mya madhu and thanks for housekeeping Adel ghanish Manish and the breakfast is very nice i passed good time with my group in Marco polo
data.title: a good flagship experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are happy to know you had a wonderful stay with us. Our team services are indeed designed to ensure that our guests will have the most memorable stay so we’re glad that this reflected your experience. I have shared your wonderful feedback to the whole team and would like you to know that it is guests like you who make all our efforts worth it. 

Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to welcome you again soon.

Regards,

The Marco Polo Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Marco Polo Hotel

data.text:
I am writing this review I visited Marco Polo in Feb 24 and My Stay was very worst was not expected such kind of Un Professional Staff at Marco Polo Dubai we stayed 3 nights and I forced to write such pathetic things I got un Professional staff specially the lady at Reception always was personal talks I stayed in Marco Polo Hongkong which was awesome they are ruining the brand image of Marco Polo by Keeping Un Professional Staff Specially the lady Shaiza I am forced to write her name ... She was asking for Job in UK when she knows that I am UK citizen

Very Rude and Un Professional Staff 1* given its also not was to give I like only the Arabic Lady Service which was excellent.. she personally escorted me and always was ready for guests needs which I saw her ... 
Next I will not recommend this Marco Polo Dubai to Any one in my family and colleagues also 

Very Bad ... pathetic and worst
data.title: Very Worst Hotel in Deira Marco Polo

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

We thank you for taking the time and sharing the feedback with us. Reviewing performance and understanding constructive criticism is an essential part in any organization’s growth process and we always welcome it.

We continue to train our staff in service excellence and surely we come across incidents where the guest experience is not what we want it to be. The moment such incidents are highlighted to us we take immediate action upon the cause of the episode and execute corrective measures via effective trainings. 

Once again, we appreciate and thank you for taking the time to share with us your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Sincerely,

The Marco Polo Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Marco Polo Hotel

data.text: Everything was good. Swimming pool was wonderful. Mr. Anil Kumar lifeguard was great and supportfull. Maintenance was so good. Kitakit was also very vibrant. We all our team enjoyed a lot at kitakit and also swimming pool. It was very fun. Wonder full experience. I stayed in room 311
data.title: Marcopolo

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to write a review.

I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay, especially the service provided by the hotel team. Thank you for your recognition of their efforts and it does inspire us to keep raising our levels of service through innovation and understanding our guests even more. 

I do hope that you will visit us again and look forward to welcoming you back.

Regards,

The Marco Polo Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Maria Tuazon
